import React from 'react' import { Item, Button } from 'semantic-ui-react' const DEFAULT_IMAGE = 'https://miro.medium.com/max/550/1*TxgjUE2uJuiRUVVmE_kU6g.png' const PostDetail = ({ postDetail }) => { const user = localStorage.getItem('user') return (
{postDetail.title} User: {postDetail.user} {postDetail.content} {(user === postDetail.user) ? ( ) : null }
) } export default PostDetail
